data:
## function_collapseHorizontalTransition
> **collapseHorizontalTransition**(`element`, `direction`, `animated`, `signal`, `context`): [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

### Parameters

• **element**: `SSRHTMLElement`

Element on which the transition should be applied.

• **direction**: `"show"` \| `"hide"`

Whether the element should be shown or hidden.

• **animated**: `boolean`

Whether the transition should be animated.

• **signal**: [`AbortSignal`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/AbortSignal)

Signal allowing to stop the transition while running.

• **context**: `object`

Context of the current transition. It is reused between calls if the previous transition was stopped while running on the same element.

### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

## function_collapseVerticalTransition

• **direction**: `"show"` \| `"hide"`

• **animated**: `boolean`

• **signal**: [`AbortSignal`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/AbortSignal)

Signal allowing to stop the transition while running.

• **context**: `object`

Context of the current transition. It is reused between calls if the previous transition was stopped while running on the same element.

### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>
